Package org.smooks.cartridges.templating

Class AbstractTemplateProcessor

java.lang.Object
org.smooks.cartridges.templating.AbstractTemplateProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.smooks.api.delivery.ContentHandler, org.smooks.api.resource.visitor.sax.ng.AfterVisitor, org.smooks.api.resource.visitor.sax.ng.BeforeVisitor, org.smooks.api.resource.visitor.sax.ng.SaxNgVisitor, org.smooks.api.resource.visitor.Visitor
Direct Known Subclasses:
FreeMarkerTemplateProcessor, XslTemplateProcessor
public abstract class AbstractTemplateProcessor extends Object implements org.smooks.api.resource.visitor.sax.ng.BeforeVisitor, org.smooks.api.resource.visitor.sax.ng.AfterVisitor
Abstract template processing unit.

Defines abstract methods for loading the template in question, as well as convienience methods for processing the template action against the templating result (REPLACE, ADD_TO, INSERT_BEFORE and INSERT_AFTER).

See implementations.

Author:
tfennelly
